welcome.description1: Hello, my name is Moussa, I am 24 years old and I live in Paris. I am currently working at CANAL+ in the Front TV team as a Front-end Developer.
welcome.description2: In my free time, I design web and mobile applications. I mainly work around the JavaScript ecosystem and make most of my applications in TypeScript.
